instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up and then tap Settings > Edge Sense . Select the Enable advanced mode check box. Follow the onscreen instructions to set the squeeze force levels. To change the action the phone takes when you squeeze it, tap Customize short squeeze action , and then choose your preferred option. To change the action the phone takes when you squeeze and hold it, tap Customize squeeze & hold action , and then choose your preferred option. Press Back button to save your settings.
